name: INTrainTrip
desc: The information that describes a train trip.

items.name: init(provider: String?, trainName: String?, trainNumber: String?, tripDuration: INDateComponentsRange, departureStationLocation: CLPlacemark, departurePlatform: String?, arrivalStationLocation: CLPlacemark, arrivalPlatform: String?)
items.desc: Creates a new train trip with the specified contents and attributes.

items.name: var provider: String?
items.desc: The name for the train company.

items.name: var trainNumber: String?
items.desc: The unique identifier for the train.

items.name: var tripDuration: INDateComponentsRange
items.desc: The date and time range for the departure and arrival of the train.

items.name: var departureStationLocation: CLPlacemark
items.desc: The station from which the train departs.

items.name: var departurePlatform: String?
items.desc: The platform from which the train departs.

items.name: var arrivalStationLocation: CLPlacemark
items.desc: The station at which the train arrives.

items.name: var arrivalPlatform: String?
items.desc: The platform at which the train arrives.
